intro_only_event_typebattle/6901_1301_02:
Starting today, some sync pairs will be teaming
up based on their Pokémon’s types to get a
better understanding of each other!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6901_1301_03:
With you as an opponent, I’m sure it’ll be great
training for everyone!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6901_1301_04:
Yeah, and it’ll be a good experience for you, too.
Come join us if you have the time!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6801_1031_01:
I’ll show you the real
power of magnificent bird
Pokémon!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6801_1301_01:
I’m aiming to become the strongest Flying-type
Trainer... So if you don’t mind, could you teach
me how you battle so elegantly?
intro_only_event_typebattle/6801_1301_02:
Heh, no need to be so formal! Just go with
the flow!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6801_1301_03: *giggle* Let’s take off and have some fun!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6802_1031_01:
Get ready for your hardest
Pokémon battle yet!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6802_1301_01:
Rumor has it that at Olivia’s shop, she doesn’t just
sell jewelry—she also sells fossils!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6802_1301_03:
*chuckle* Don’t forget to stop by if you visit me
in Alola!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6803_1301_01:
It was a surprise to see how much fans love your
illusions, Wallace.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6803_1301_02:
Apparently, a lot of his Gym Trainers are fans of
his as well!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6803_1301_03:
Our fans’ support will help us shine even brighter!
I want even more people to be charmed by our
Water-type Pokémon!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6804_1031_01:
I guess you’ll give me a
good match.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6804_1301_01:
An Elite Four? We haven’t got anything like that
in Galar.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6804_1301_03:
I hear the competition between Gym Leaders is
fierce, though. Guess it can be different from
region to region.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6805_1301_01:
So the two of you use other types, too, right?
Not just Steel?
intro_only_event_typebattle/6805_1301_02:
That’s right! Steel-type Pokémon are my
favorite, though.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6805_1301_03:
I don’t really have a preference as long as I can
collect my data.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6805_1301_04:
We may have more in common than
I thought!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6806_1031_01:
We’re more than just
a pretty face!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6806_1301_01:
Would you all like to go shopping for clothes
together sometime?
intro_only_event_typebattle/6806_1301_02:
*chuckle* I’d love to! I have a good eye for
fashion, you know.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6806_1301_03:
Hey, if you find something good, could you model
it for a few sketches?
intro_only_event_typebattle/6807_1031_01:
Make all the fine
ingredients of
your team shine!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6807_1301_01:
Is it true that your recipes are a bit
unique, Mallow?
intro_only_event_typebattle/6807_1301_02:
Yeah! My cooking is a harmony of all sorts of
ingredients! Even Olivia’s a big fan of it.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6807_1301_03: How lovely. I sure would like to try some one day.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6808_1031_01:
I’ll take this opportunity to
learn and grow!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6808_1301_01:
Hey, wanna try an even tougher training regimen
to prepare for our upcoming battles?
intro_only_event_typebattle/6808_1301_02:
Good idea! My fists will keep pounding until
they break!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6808_1301_03:
I humbly accept your offer...and will gladly
accompany you!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6809_1301_01: Silvally is able to change its type, right?
intro_only_event_typebattle/6809_1301_02:
I’ve heard rumors from other Sinnoh Trainers that
there’s a Legendary Pokémon with a similar ability.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6809_1301_03: Is that so? I’d like to look into that a bit more.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6810_1301_01: My Pokémon saved me on the battlefield!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6810_1301_02:
It must have been a very good partner. Although it
pains me to hear that Pokémon were used for such
a conflict...
intro_only_event_typebattle/6810_1301_03:
That’s where we come in! Let’s do our best to
keep this world peaceful!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6811_1031_01:
How exciting! Makes this
old man want to holler!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6811_1301_01:
Speaking of ice, I spent many a day practicing
Ice-type moves with Crabominable on
Mount Lanakila.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6811_1301_02:
It must be a lovely mountain... I hear you can see
diamond dust there!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6811_1301_03:
I would love to see what snowy scenery looks like
in Alola!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6812_1031_01:
There won’t be any letup
from me!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6812_1301_01:
Cynthia, I imagine your Garchomp would be
well suited for tilling fields.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6812_1301_02:
Yessiree, I’d like to ask ’er to do a job or two
for me, too!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6812_1301_03:
*chuckle* We Champions don’t come cheap,
you know.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6813_1031_01:
Don’t you think some
dummies are cute in
their dumbness?
intro_only_event_typebattle/6813_1301_01:
Your daughter uses Poison-type Pokémon,
too, right?
intro_only_event_typebattle/6813_1301_02:
Yes indeed! And she’s so strong that I’ve left my
Gym in her capable hands.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6813_1301_03:
A father and daughter, both Poison-type users...
Not bad...
intro_only_event_typebattle/6814_1031_01:
Beat ’em down with
bug Pokémon, yo!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6814_1301_01: Your Volcarona is so cool, Alder!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6814_1301_02:
Back in the day, I saw it in my Pokédex
and thought it was pretty rad, too.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6814_1301_03:
The same thing happened to me! I guess what
you find cool as a kid doesn’t change, even
in adulthood.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6815_1301_01:
I’d love if more people could see how great
Ghost-type Pokémon are!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6815_1301_02:
Oooh! Maybe we can have a spooky ghost
story contest!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6815_1301_03:
I have a few thrillers that I’d be more than happy
to share!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6816_1031_01:
I wish I could see into
the future...
intro_only_event_typebattle/6816_1301_01:
Um...can you look into my future? I’d like to know
if I really become a Pokémon Professor!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6816_1301_02:
I know you may be curious, but unfortunately, I
can’t tell you what I see.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6816_1301_03:
Yes. If you stop trying because you know the
answer, it may change your future.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6817_1031_01:
I’m gonna do my best
with Ali!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6817_1301_01:
I wonder what the Village of Dragons and
Blackthorn City are like.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6817_1301_02:
Blackthorn is a quiet city standing among the
mountains. It’s a great place.
intro_only_event_typebattle/6817_1301_03:
I hope everyone can visit me at the Village of
Dragons one day!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6818_1031_01:
It’s time to turn up
the heat!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6818_1301_01:
Maybe I should get my own signature
pose, too!
intro_only_event_typebattle/6818_1301_03:
It’d be great if you could make it look big and
billowing, like smoke!
